input.sentences: [male] and [female] were very excited because they were about to take their first cruise .
they decided they would take a cruise to location | location .
as they neared location | they could see the hotel they planned to stay in after they got off the ship .
once they were settled | they decided to explore the city and bicycles were an option .

output.sentences: The male and female are excited to be on the boat.
They finally decided on a location to take their cruise.
As planned, they were to stay on the ship.
They also had the option to explore once they were settled at the port.
The lavish mansions had glorious gardens.
